Description: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  Gives the slotted power a chance to grant a small amount of damage absorption to the caster and nearby allies for a short time and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%.  This effect will be triggered roughly 4 times per minute.  This enhancement can only be slotted by Defenders and may be slotted into any Defender damage power.
